column4: You'll find yourself banned, fast, if you keep causing trouble.

yeah, but if that was all, it would be nothing. Banning you right away doesnt even allow you to explain, refrase, elaborate. _Keeping_ you banned after asking for admission makes one fear for the worst, where #ubuntu-nl is concerned
mabus06: I dont want to cause trouble
Then just don't insult people, talk about ripping people's faces off, etc.
